comments:
I unzipped eclipse-SDK-3.0M2-linux-gtk.zip to ~/ and then clicked on eclipse
executable inside the eclipse folder. It threw an error in a dialogue box saying 

"Problems during startup. Check the ".log" file
in the ".metadata" directory of your workspace."

It happens on RH9 with and on Gentoo.

Looks like a duplicate of bug 35944. Which tool are you using to unzip Eclipse
install?

You are right. I was using Ark in kde to unzip the archive, when I used "unzip" to do it, it 
started working fine. Thanks for your help.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 35944 ***
